Articles.Content: Just making a suggestion here. While I can -build- aircraft, I just can't fly them worth a (obscene word). While I'm building up a nice heap of debris and dead Kerbals, I'd like to know how well my aircraft can fly, instead of making pretty fireballs near the runway...
Yeah, autopilots, be it for planes or rockets, won't be in the game. But this is why the devs left the game moddable, so modders can fill the gaps the developers don't want to fill themselves.
Autopilots won't ever come in the game. You can try Mechjeb if you want, it's the most popular autopilot mod for KSP.
